Linux Shell 脚本编写指南 Linux Shell Scripting Tutorial (LSST) Written by Vivek Gite Translated by Chunhui 2020-09-01 Preface 前言 Project Updated: 2021-12-08 这是春晖翻译的Linux Shell 脚本编写指南，用以记录本人学习Linux Shell Scripting Tutorial (LSST) v2.0的历程。 Authors & Acknowledgements Authors About Chunhui Jack Dougherty is Professor of Educational Studies at Trinity College in Hartford, Connecticut. He teaches a data visualization course where students partner with community organizations to help them tell their stories online with interactive charts and maps. Trained as a historian, Jack learned data visualization to share evidence more widely about cities, suburbs, and schools over time for his On The Line book. Visit his website or follow him on Twitter.
